name: A Deal on the Moon
description:
Hello!
I'm FisherG.

After a long weekend, a saturday of family stress in which no work was done, and a crammed sunday,
I present to you, "A Deal on the Moon"

=Controls=

Movement - Arrow Keys
Interact/Shoot - 'X' or 'Z'
Chek Health - 'C'

=Story=
You play as an astronaut crash landing on the moon in an 'inescapable valley'. You make your way 
through a canyon and are greeted with a lone shopkeeper, who reveals he wants more than your money,
your soul! With him as your only way out, you need to find 2 vessels to withold your soul to 
exchange for a repaired rocket, and then fly out. 

=Tips=
Talk to him twice.
If you die, you'll be returned to the shopkeeper's room, with full health.
Any time you go to the shopkeeper's room you'll have full health. 
Kill enemies, because if you don't you'll have to back track through them!
